mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_term_base.select */ SELECT term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */ ,aply_strt_dt /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */ ,term_cntn /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */ ,essn_yn /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_term_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_term_base.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_term_base ( term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */ ,aply_strt_dt /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */ ,term_cntn /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */ ,essn_yn /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */ ,#{aplyStrtDt} /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */ ,#{termCntn} /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */ ,#{essnYn} /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */ ,#{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_term_base.update */ UPDATE ti_term_base
,aply_strt_dt = #{aplyStrtDt} /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */
,term_cntn = #{termCntn} /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */
,essn_yn = #{essnYn} /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */
,sort_ord = #{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_term_base.merge */ INSERT INTO ti_term_base ( term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */ ,aply_strt_dt /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */ ,term_cntn /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */ ,essn_yn /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */ ,#{aplyStrtDt} /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */ ,#{termCntn} /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */ ,#{essnYn} /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */ ,#{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT ti_term_base_pkey DO UPDATE SET
,aply_strt_dt = #{aplyStrtDt} /* aply_strt_dt 적용_시작_일자 character(8) */
,term_cntn = #{termCntn} /* term_cntn 약관_내용 text */
,essn_yn = #{essnYn} /* essn_yn 필수_여부 character(1) */
,sort_ord = #{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_term_base.delete */ DELETE FROM ti_term_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 character varying(20) */
